title: PSA: Apple services including iMessage, Apple Music, iCloud, and more are currently down [U]
content:
Update: Apple System Status page shows that all outages have been resolved and its services are now back.

It’s not just you, multiple Apple services are currently down. According to the Apple System Status page, some services are facing an outage since 10:32 am PT. Down Detector and many Twitter users pointed out this outage before Apple.
